full_sentence: Promiscuous people are for sleeping with, and not for marrying. Who are these people? not virgins that's for sure haha. when you start dating them they dress in a way that you don't have to use much of your imagination to know what their body looks like, they engage in behavior that repeatedly gets the sexual attention of others, especially when they're in a relationship. it doesn't matter whether they say it's not for getting that attention. pay attention to their actions, not their words. if you feel a certain way, it was intended to be that way. so if these people dress in a way that turns heads because they are showing off enough they're doing it on purpose This trash is not worth marrying. Maybe dating for a short period of time, just don't get invested emotionally.
What was the 2016 referendum result in your home constituency? I bet you're from one of them gammon dump/chav hellhole/jeremy kyle guest farm places that voted 63% leave.

This was what it is like some days coming home from the city in Perth, Western Australia. Last year I was the only white person in over 40 people on the bus home. However they segregate. African blacks in the front of the bus, Aboriginals in the back few rows. Then mixed Asian and muslims in the middle. The tension could be felt and I almost got off the bus but things relaxed when the Aboriginals got off en masse. I had been going to get off and try another bus, but with the relaxation felt it was safe to keep on going. Its getting a bit much when these are the decisions we have to make each day
I fucking hate this shit! Want to die lol!
